ruling.translation[0].definitions[0].def: an official decision, especially one made by a court
ruling.translation[0].definitions[0].exa: the recent Supreme Court ruling on defendants’ rights
ruling.translation[1].definitions[0].def: the ruling group in a country or organization is the group that controls it
ruling.translation[1].definitions[0].exa: the ruling body of American golf
ruling.translation[1].definitions[1].def: a ruling interest or emotion interests someone more than anything else
ruling.translation[1].definitions[1].exa: Football remains the ruling passion of many men.
ruling.translation[2].definitions[0].def: an official decision, especially one made by a court
ruling.translation[2].definitions[0].exa: a district court ruling that the plaintiff’s medical evidence was unreliable
The Commission must issue a final ruling by October.
ruling.translation[3].definitions[0].def: the ruling group in a country or organization is the group that controls it
